Today in Donegal, it's looking solid with 7 ft @ 11s W swell and fresh 16 mph WSW winds. Magheroaty Beach and Mageroaty are both working well, so grab your board! Tomorrow brings even better conditions with 7 ft @ 14s W swell and lighter 9 mph SSE winds, making for a fun day at spots like Rossnowlagh and Tullan Strand. On the day after, expect 6 ft @ 13s WSW with light 4 mph W winds, keeping it clean and enjoyable at places like Magheroaty Beach. Best: tomorrow.
